com.lithium.community.android.ui.components.adapters

Class LiBrowseAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • <any>
      • com.lithium.community.android.ui.components.adapters.LiBaseRecyclerAdapter
        • com.lithium.community.android.ui.components.adapters.LiBrowseAdapter

  • public class LiBrowseAdapter
extends LiBaseRecyclerAdapter
    RecyclerView.Adapter that can display a LiBrowse and makes a call to the specified LiOnMessageRowClickListener.
